Interface MDPProblem

All Known Implementing Classes:
DynamicMDPProblem
public interface MDPProblem

Method Summary
 Action getAction(int index)
          Returns Action with the given index
 List<Action> getActions()
          Returns a list of the action names in this problem
 double getDiscountFactor()
          Returns the discount factory for this problem.
 double getReward(int s, Action act, int sp)
          reward function: S x A x S' --> R
 State getState(int index)
          Returns the state given an index.
 List<State> getStates()
          Returns a list of the states in this MDP problem, the index of a state in this list corresponds to their index in the TransitionMatrix objects returned from this problem
 Map<Action,TransitionMatrix> getTransitionMatrices()
          Returns a map of the TransitionMatrix objects in this problem.
 double getTransitionProbability(int s, Action act, int sp)
          Returns the probability of transitioning from state s to state sp using action act.
